quotes.quote: If Java had true garbage collection, most programs would delete themselves upon execution.
quotes.author: Robert Sewell

quotes.quote: You should name a variable using the same care with which you name a first-born child.
quotes.author: James O. Coplien

quotes.quote: Documentation is like sex; when it's good, it's very, very good, and when it's bad, it's better than nothing.
quotes.author: Dick Brandon

quotes.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live
quotes.author: Rick Osborne

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of programming languages: those people always bitch about and those nobody uses.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation, naming things and off-by-one errors.
quotes.author: Phil Karlton

quotes.quote: The most amazing achievement of the computer software industry is its continuing cancellation of the steady and staggering gains made by the computer hardware industry.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.
quotes.author: Rich Cook

quotes.quote: In C++ it’s harder to shoot yourself in the foot, but when you do, you blow off your whole leg.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Most software today is very much like an Egyptian pyramid with millions of bricks piled on top of each other, with no structural integrity, but just done by brute force and thousands of slaves.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: Perl – The only language that looks the same before and after RSA encryption.
quotes.author: Keith Bostic

quotes.quote: Programming is like sex: one mistake and you’re providing support for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Michael Sinz

quotes.quote: Writing the first 90 percent of a computer program takes 90 percent of the time. The remaining ten percent also takes 90 percent of the time and the final touches also take 90 percent of the time.
quotes.author: N.J. Rubenking

quotes.quote: I have always wished for my computer to be as easy to use as my telephone; my wish has come true because I can no longer figure out how to use my telephone.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: PHP is a minor evil perpetrated and created by incompetent amateurs, whereas Perl is a great and insidious evil, perpetrated by skilled but perverted professionals.
quotes.author: Jon Ribbens

quotes.quote: We should forget about small efficiencies, say about 97% of the time: premature optimization is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: C. A. R. Hoare

quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: It always takes longer than you expect, even when you take into account Hofstadter’s Law.
quotes.author: Hofstadter’s Law

quotes.quote: In theory, theory and practice are the same. In practice, they’re not.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The difference between theory and practice is that in theory, there is no difference between theory and practice.
quotes.author: Richard Moore

quotes.quote: There are two ways of constructing a software design; one way is to make it so simple that there are obviously no deficiencies, and the other way is to make it so complicated that there are no obvious deficiencies. The first method is far more difficult.
quotes.author: C. A. R. Hoare

quotes.quote: Einstein argued that there must be simplified explanations of nature, because God is not capricious or arbitrary. No such faith comforts the software engineer.
quotes.author: Fred Brooks

quotes.quote: Real stupidity beats artificial intelligence every time.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.quote: I believe that at the end of the century the use of words and general educated opinion will have altered so much that one will be able to speak of machines thinking without expecting to be contradicted.
quotes.author: Alan Turing

quotes.quote: Sometimes it seems as though each new step towards AI, rather than producing something which everyone agrees is real intelligence, merely reveals what real intelligence is not.
quotes.author: Douglas Hofstadter

quotes.quote: By far the greatest danger of Artificial Intelligence is that people conclude too early that they understand it.
quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quotes.quote: People worry that computers will get too smart and take over the world, but the real problem is that they're too stupid and they've already taken over the world.
quotes.author: Pedro Domingos

quotes.quote: The Turing test cuts both ways. You can't tell if a machine has gotten smarter or if you've just lowered your own standards of intelligence to such a degree that the machine seems smart.
quotes.author: Jaron Lanier

quotes.quote: Success in creating AI would be the biggest event in human history. Unfortunately, it might also be the last, unless we learn how to avoid the risks.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: A single neuron in the brain is an incredibly complex machine that even today we don't understand. A single 'neuron' in a neural network is an incredibly simple mathematical function that captures a minuscule fraction of the complexity of a biological neuron.
quotes.author: Andrew Ng

quotes.quote: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: It’s the job that’s never started as takes longest to finish, as my old gaffer used to say.
quotes.author: Samwise Gamgee

quotes.quote: Short cuts make long delays.
quotes.author: Pippin Took

quotes.quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
quotes.author: Paul R. Ehrlich

quotes.quote: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris
